roleset.name: spank
roleset.note: SPANK-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: flog, hand-checked by Kevin. Member of VNcls spank-18.3. (from spank.01-v)

example.name: from Google
example.text: A Harvey boy said in a federal lawsuit that a police detective spanked him with a wooden paddle when the boy as at the Harveypolice station.
example.arg: when the boy was at the Harvey police station
